examples: Put a donut next to the flour.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The prompt to generate an image from.

num_images.title: Num Images
num_images.description: The number of images to generate.

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated image.

output_format.title: Output Format
output_format.description: The format of the generated image.

image_url.title: Image URL
image_url.description: Image prompt for the omni model.

sync_mode.title: Sync Mode
sync_mode.description: If `True`, the media will be returned as a data URI and the output data won't be available in the request history.

safety_tolerance.title: Safety Tolerance
safety_tolerance.description: The safety tolerance level for the generated image. 1 being the most strict and 5 being the most permissive.

guidance_scale.title: Guidance scale (CFG)
guidance_scale.description:
The CFG (Classifier Free Guidance) scale is a measure of how close you want
            the model to stick to your prompt when looking for a related image to show you.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description:
The same seed and the same prompt given to the same version of the model
            will output the same image every time.

enhance_prompt.title: Enhance Prompt
enhance_prompt.description: Whether to enhance the prompt for better results.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The prompt used for generating the image.

has_nsfw_concepts.title: Has Nsfw Concepts
has_nsfw_concepts.description: Whether the generated images contain NSFW concepts.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description:
Seed of the generated Image. It will be the same value of the one passed in the
            input or the randomly generated that was used in case none was passed.

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

height.title: Height
height.description: The height of the image in pixels.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the image in pixels.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
